instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 150Â°C, gas mark 2. Mix the peanut butter, sunflower oil and maple syrup together in a large mixing bowl, then stir through all the remaining ingredients apart from the dried blueberries.

Tip the mixture onto a large parchment-lined baking tray; spread in an even layer. Bake for 40 minutes, stirring halfway, until lightly crisp and golden. Stir through the blueberries, then return to the oven for a final 5 minutes; set aside to cool completely. Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month.
